101-64a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sap+ta pud+d+ha kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun du bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas/ brdol zhing gcer bu gos med la lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang / dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no/ / cig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das

128
101-64b kyis bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas bdun sprul ba mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo / /bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M ha la ha la/ hi la hi lA ya/ na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/ /mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /

129
101-65a na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM pa tsa pa tsa pA tsa ya pA tsa ya/ sarba b+hU tA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ya/ kI la ya/ ba ra bid+yA nAM swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bsgom nyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin mtshan gsum yid la byed na/ de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa la sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no/ /chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /skud pas bdag la bsrung ngo / / byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku lo t+hA d+ha nA nAM ku ru sarba gra hA NAM swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal ba bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang

130
101-65b sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing / chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o/ /'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so/ /mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/ /dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la btags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rA dzA nAM rA dzA mA tram+bA ba shI ka ra tu kA me na/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa sbyang zhing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang / na la dang / khre dang / shi ri sha dang / rgya spos dang / gum kum dang / gla sgang dang / in+d+ra ba ru Na dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo thogs dang 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying pos lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o/ /dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas

131
101-66a sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /gdon dang srung ba dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tshan+dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ka Tha ka Tha/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ki Thi ki Thi/ ki TA ba ya na maHswA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel zhes bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig /blangs shing bzung ste/ kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'byong bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /zas dang skom kyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru

132
101-66b bar bya'o/ /lhog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las thar par bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na rtag tu nor yang 'phel par 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la ci smos pa de thams cad ston to/ /tshe'am stobs sam pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya k+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ si ri si ri/ si rA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma d+hu mA ya/ na mo na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang chu dang lce 'babs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas

133
101-67a brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la bza' thams cad la khrus bya'o/ /mdze dang skrangs nad dang mchin skran la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de las thams cad ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ o~M ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ sid+d+h+yan tu man+t+ra pA da swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo'am/ mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byas na mdor na rmi lam na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/

134
101-67b sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdze dang sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/ /klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ /g+hu me g+hu me/ ma hA g+hu me/ ta le te le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re/ ma hA d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi li mi li/ ma hA mi li/ ti li ti li/ ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA d+hu me/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/ /sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas bya'o/ / dug spon chus bya'o/ /las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/ /khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/ /cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
